caption: Relating to the determination of resident status of students by public institutions of higher education.
authors: Vasut, Leo Wilson, Hayes, Cain, Olcott
summary: The bill concerns determining resident status of students at public higher education institutions in Texas. While not explicitly targeting Chinese students, this could affect all international students including Chinese nationals in determining their residency status for tuition purposes. Changes in residency determination could impact tuition rates and eligibility for in-state tuition benefits for international students.
translation: 该法案涉及德克萨斯州公立高等教育机构对学生居民身份的认定。虽然没有明确针对中国学生，但这可能会影响包括中国留学生在内的所有国际学生的居民身份认定。居民身份认定的变化可能会影响国际学生的学费标准和获得州内学费优惠的资格。
committees:
1. House Committee on Higher Education
2. Senate Committee on Education
3. Senate Committee on Higher Education
